already_have_an_account: Already have an account? Log in
attribute_must_be_timestamp: Selected attribute must be a timestamp
configure_hierarchy_description:
Please select the method used for aggregating states. This method constructs a hierarchy by merging states constructed in the previous step. We offer two aggregation methods.

Distance based aggregation merges states based on their position.

Transition based aggregation merges states if they are well connected.
configure_states_description: Please select and configure the algorithm which will be used to construct the lowest scale states.
configure_time_attribute_description:
Select the attribute which will represent time. This attribute will be used to model the datas' dynamics. Any numerical millisecond time format is acceptable.

After the time attribute is selected also specify the time unit used by the model.
delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete_account_warning: If you delete your account, all your data will be lost forever!
delete_model_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete model {{model}}?
file_has_been_removed: File {{name}} has been removed from server.
include_derivatives_of_selected_attribut: Derivatives of selected numeric attributes will be included in model construction
include_time_attributes_in_model: Include time attributes in model construction
invalid_dataset_instructions: Dataset is invalid. Please read the instructions above.
my_models_description:
This table contains private offline models. Offline models can be used to visualize any dataset and only require users to upload a CSV file.

To create a new model, click the Add button.
remove_file_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove file {{name}}?
reset_link_expired: Reset link expired? Request a new one
select_attributes_description:
Select the attributes that you would like to include in your model, one including the attribute which will represent time. The attributes not selected here will be ignored.

In the current version we only support numerical attributes.
send_request_for_password_reset: Enter your e-mail address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
share_model_confirmation: Are you sure you want to share model {{model}}?
unshare_model_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unshare model {{model}}?
upload_CSV_description: Upload the CSV file you would like to model. The system expects the columns of the CSV file to be named in the first line of the file and that one attribute is a numerical representation of time. This can be any millisecond time representation.

successful_account_activation.title: You have successfully activated your account
successful_account_activation.message: You can now log in with your credentials.

successful_account_deletion.title: You have successfully deleted your account
successful_account_deletion.message: You can create a new account with your e-mail address anytime you want.

successful_password_reset.title: You have successfully reset your password
successful_password_reset.message: You can now log in with the new password.

successful_password_reset_initiation.title: Your request for password reset has been successfully processed
successful_password_reset_initiation.message: You should receive an e-mail with password reset link shortly. Be sure to also check spam folder if you don't find it in your inbox.

successful_registration.title: You have been successfully registered
successful_registration.message: You should receive an e-mail with activation link shortly. Be sure to also check spam folder if you don't find it in your inbox.

error.activation_failed: Activation failed. Is your account already activated?
error.password_reset_failed: Failed to reset your password. If your password reset link expired, please request a new one.
error.password_update_failed: Failed to save your new password.
error.registration_failed: Registration failed. Couldn't add new user.
error.short_password: Password must have at least {{count}} characters.
error.value_must_be_between: Value must be a number between {{min}} and {{max}}.
